Instruction: Mix zucchini and onion together in a big bowl.
Combine flour, cornmeal, salt, pepper, and garlic powder in a small bowl, stirring until thoroughly mixed.

Combine the flour mixture with the zucchini mixture by covering the bowl and shaking until the vegetables are thoroughly coated. Allow the mixture to rest until a batter forms on the vegetables, approximately 30 minutes.
Fry the coated vegetables in hot oil in a medium skillet over medium heat until they are golden brown, turning to ensure even cooking.
